import React from 'react' import { Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import ItemCount from '../ ItemCount/ ItemCount' const ItemDetail = ({name, price, img, description, stock}) => { const { id } = useParams(); let path = '/'; return (
{name} {price} {description}
) } export default ItemDetail
